definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: Gloz had been up to inspect the disposition for the attack and was on his way to an observation post .
sentences.chinese: 戈尔兹到山上视察了进攻部署，到一个观察哨去了。

sentences.english: The working environment for guards at the observation post is very tough.
sentences.chinese: 观察哨上的哨兵工作环境很艰苦。

sentences.english: This Iraqi Army security tower surveys the destroyed Jamila Market in Sadr City.
sentences.chinese: 伊军观察哨监视萨德尔城内被破坏的贾米拉市场。

sentences.english: The network was not visible from the air, or from ground-level observation posts.
sentences.chinese: 该网络是不可见，从空中，或从地面水平观察哨所。

definition: defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works
to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
the situation of the enemy positions/intelligence about the enemy
